thread.title: What Comfort Foods Are Popular In Your Country
thread.title_full: What Comfort Foods Are Popular In Your Country

author: Jasmin Nahar
title: What Comfort Foods Are Popular In Your Country
text:
View this image › 
Columbia Pictures ID: 10653543 2. So what we want to know is, what delicious comfort food do you eat in your country? View this image › 
Disney ID: 10653671 3. Maybe it’s a hearty meal, like a toad in the hole from the UK. Loading View on Instagram 
instagram.com Sausages and Yorkshire pudding batter is the most perfect combination.
ID: 10653541 4. Or maybe it’s something more sweet, like this Indian gajar halwa made with carrots and milk. Loading View on Instagram 
instagram.com ID: 10653542 5. It could even be a comfort food taken to the next level. This Canadian poutine is a pretty good example. Loading View on Instagram 
instagram.com Because chips are ten times better with cheese and gravy.
ID: 10653547 6. Tell us about your country’s comfort food in the comments below and you could be included in a future BuzzFeed Community post! ID: 10653549 Check out more articles on BuzzFeed.com!
